channel.title: Histogram on Dominic Mariano's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Histogram on Dominic Mariano's blog

item.title: Histogram
item.description: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) query<-"SELECT weight FROM Master" result<-sqldf(query) #visualizing the data ggplot()+ geom_histogram(data=result,aes(x=weight),color="green",fill="black",bins=50)+ ggtitle("Baseball Player Body-Weight Distribution")
